posts.post_content:
This + [Last Laugh](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Last Laugh) + [Blessing of Leeches](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Blessing of Leeches) and deal 1 point of damage to High Priest of Penance. It is a 3 card combo, (unless you count the 1 point damage dealing as a 4th, but run 4 of each in a 60 card deck with some tutors and board wipes just in case. Could be quite powerful.   
  
Best part that makes him a 5/5...."may"

Posted By: XTwistedsoulX (1/24/2013 8:15:04 AM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: I love this card. I want this, [Last Laugh](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Last Laugh), and [Avacyn, Angel of Hope](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Avacyn, Angel of Hope) out at the same time. Anything dies and you will most likely wipe your opponents side of the board if you have the life for it. You can always choose one of your indestructible permanents to destroy to turn the cycle off if all of their creatures are dead (which they probably will be because all of the hexproof bypassing damage Last Laugh is throwing around). Add a [Personal Sanctuary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Personal Sanctuary) and a sacrifice engine and you're in business.
posts.html:
I love this card. I want this, Last Laugh, and Avacyn, Angel of Hope out at the same time. Anything dies and you will most likely wipe your opponents side of the board if you have the life for it. You can always choose one of your indestructible permanents to destroy to turn the cycle off if all of their creatures are dead (which they probably will be because all of the hexproof bypassing damage Last Laugh is throwing around). Add a Personal Sanctuary and a sacrifice engine and you're in business.
